A join (reg) is not creating a null value but creating a 0 instead. See
output for 408 which should be null not 0


201,202
202,203
203,204
204,405
205,206
206,207
207,204
401,402
402,403
403,404
404,408
405,406
406,407
407,404
408,0
----- 1 ----
